page.title: 07Children and Drugs
page.content: { One of the biggest problems involving children in Kirkby today is drugs. Young children don't just smoke cigarettes and drink any more but take stronger drugs like cannabis and a few even take heroin. Nearly everybody knows somebody who is on drugs and can see the damage that they cause. Glue sniffing used to be a very big problem but a lot of hard work by teachers and other people involved with children has helped it prevent it spreading more. It is hoped that the same effort will also help control the drug problem. The Police and teachers and people like that are doing their best but is up to the children to realise how dangerous drugs are.
